translation_info.title: KAKAIYARI NIUKIEYA XAPAYARI WIXARIKAKI

verses.text: Merikitsi mexiakame wiyaritsie ti'aitakaku Tsiru, Peritsiya kwieyaritsie ti'aitame, Yawé ti'aitame 'iyarieya mipai katiniuyuitiani, miki ti'aitame minetianiki 'aitsika naitsarie mitani'axianiki mira'aitatsie, hiki mipai miraye'atiarieniki Yawé niukieya Keremiyaxi kemitiupitia. [cite: 6]

'Ipai paine Tsiru, Peritsiya kwieyaritsie ti'aitame: >>Yawé, Kakaiyari taheima makawe, hiki 'ena kwiepa yunaime te'aitamete minetsiyetuiri, kaneniuhiritiani nemitawewieniki tuki Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie, Kura kwieyaritsie. [cite: 8]

Hiki 'ayumieme, kemi'ane Kura mikiekame, Kerutsareme keheyani Yawé tukieya metawewieniki, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, miki Kakaiyari Kerutsareme muyeika, merikite miki Kakaiyari kewareparewieka nekanaineni. [cite: 9]

Meta mipai nepira'aita yunaiti kiekatari naitsarie kiekaritetsie hakewa meme'uwa huriyutsixi memiyuhayewatiwe xekeniwareparewi xetewakupitiwati pirata meta huru, piinite meta tewaxi, meta kexemiteyiwawe xeketeneyetua 'imikieri Kakaiyari tukieyatsie mieme Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie metawewiyani». [cite: 10]

Hiki Wenikamini nuiwarimama meta Kura nuiwarimama 'ukirawetsixi memanuyetei, yaxeikia yunaiti mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsixi, yunaiti kemi'ane Kakaiyari mipai mitiwaruyuitia wa'iyaritsie memiyehuki tuki tawarita memetawewieniki, yamekateniuxata memiyehuki Kerutsareme. [cite: 15]

Hiki memikawateiterimatikai yunaiti kaniwaruparewieni pirataki meta huruki, piiniteki meta tewaxi waheki, piinite miraye'atikaki, meta 'imikierite mekaniwayetuirieni tiwaikawame kememiteyiwawekai. [cite: 16]
Metatsiere, ti'aitame Tsiru, katiniuta'aita mirewayetikieniki piinite Nawukurunutsuxi mirewayetikai Yawé tukita Kerutsareme, hiki miki yukakaiyari tukita pita katineutapikaitini. [cite: 17]
Tsiru katiniyetuani tumini hiweme Mitiriratexi hetsia, mikita tiuti'iniataka, katiniyetuani Tsetsiwatsaxi hetsia Kura kwieyaritsie memakunuaxianikekai wa'ukiyari. [cite: 18]
Miki piinite mitiyetuiya mipai katiniipaimekaitini: watsute 'aminene huruki miwewiyatika (30), watsute 'aminene pirataki miwewiyatika (1.000), nawaxate (29). [cite: 19, 20]
watsute yaki minenekai huruki miwewiyatika (30), watsute yaki minenekai pirataki miwewiyatika (410), meta yiki ti'aneneti hipati (1.000). [cite: 20]

Miki tiyuniti huruki pirataki mitiwewiyatika pitipaimekai: 'auxiwime miriyari heimana nauka tsienituyari (5.400) piinite. Naime 'iki piinite Tsetsiwatsaxi katinetini Kerutsareme paiti kepauka Nawukurunutsuxi Wawiruniya memehapaniekai memupitiarietsie memakunuaxianiki. [cite: 24, 25, 26]

'Iki 'ena mepaye'uxa teiteri Kura kwieyaritsie memikiekataritikai Nawukurunutsuxi, Wawiruniyatsie ti'aitame, muwarehapa Wawiruniya paiti, meta kemi'ane memupitiarie Kerutsareme meta Kura kwieyaritsie hutarieka memi'axianiki. [cite: 31]

Yuxexiiti miki mekaniu'axiani yukiekaritsie, mewaraweiyati Tsuruwaweri, Ketsuha, Nehemiyaxi, Tserahiyaxi, Xerahiyaxi, Maxirukeyu, Wiritsani, Mitsipaxi, Wihiwahi, Xekuni meta Wanaha. 'Iki 'ixaheritsixi kemeyupaimeti memakunuaxia: Parutsi niwemama (4), Tsepatiyaxi niwemama (5) 'Araki niwemama (6) Pakati-Muhawi niwemama, tatsiari Ketsuha meta Kuhawi w (7) 'Erami niwemama (7) Tsatuhu niwemama (8) Tsakahi niwemama (9) Wanihi niwemama (10) Wewahi niwemama (11) 'Atsikari niwemama (12) 'Arunikani niwemama (13) Wihiwahi niwemama (14) 'Arini niwemama (15) 'Atexi niwemama 'Etsekiyaxi titi (16) Wetsahi niwemama (17) Kuraha niwemama (18) Katsuni niwemama (19) Kiwaxi niwemama (20) Wereni kiekatariita (21) Netupa kiekatari (22) 'Anatuti kiekatari (23) 'Atsimaweti kiekatari (24) Kiriati-Yeharini, Kapira meta Weruti kiekatarita (25) Xama meta Kehewa kiekatari (26) Mikimatsi kiekatari (27) Weteri meta 'Ahi kiekatarita (28) Newu kiekatari (29) Makiwitsi kiekatari (30) Xewitita 'Erami kiekatari (31) Karini kiekatari (32) Ruri, Kariri meta 'Unuhu kiekatari (33) Keriku kiekatari (34) Tsena kiekatari (35) Mawari wewiwamete Kerahiyaxi nuiwarimama, Ketsuha t (36) 'Imexi niwemamata (37) Patsuxi niwemamata (38) Karini niwemamata (39) Rewitsixi Ketsuha nuiwarimama meta Karimieri, miki Hur (40) Kwikamete 'Atsahapi nuiwarimama (41) Kitenie memu'uwe Tsaruni, 'Atexi, Tarimuni, 'Akuwi, Katita (42) Tukita te'uximayatamete 'iki waniwema mepihikitikai Tsika, Katsupa, Tawahuti, (43) Kerutsi, Tsihaka, Paruni, (44) Rewana, Hakawa, 'Akuwi, (45) Hakawi, Tsarimahi, Kanahani, (46) Kireri, Kahaxi, Xehahiyaxi, (47) Xetsini, Nekura, Katsani (48) 'Utsa, Patsehaki, Wetsahi, (49) 'Atsena, Mehunini, Neputsini, (50) Wakuwuki, Kakupa, Kaxikuxi, (51) Watsiruti, Mekira, Karitsa, (52) Warikuxi, Tsitsara, Temaha, (53) Netsihaki meta Katipaha. (54) Tsarumuni te'uximayatsiriwamete wanuiwarima mekanihikitikaitini Tsutahi niwemama meta Tsupereti, Perura, (55) Kahara, Rarikuni, Kireri, (56) Tsepatiyaxi, Katiri, Pukereti-Hatsewahini meta 'Amuni. (57) Tukita te'uximayatamete meta Tsarumuni te'uximayatsiriv (58) Hipatita mekaniu'axiani Teri-Meraki me'anexiaka, Teri-Karitsa, Keruwi, 'Aruhuni meta 'Imexi, peru miki mepika'iyiwekaxia memiyutahekiataki kename 'ixaheritsixi mehiki: (59) Rerahiyaxi xiiyarimama, Tuwiyaxi meta Nekura, yunaiti m (60) Hipati mawari wewiwamete, wa'ukitsiema waxapayari pika'ukaxeiyarie mepika'iyiwekaxia 'ixaheritsixi memayuyeitiani: Kawahiyaxi, Kuhutsi meta Waxitsirahi wanuiwarima, ('iki 'imatirieka mieme xeime Karaha kiekame nu'aya kaniutiwitini Waxitsirahi mititewakai, hiki miki yumune hepai katiniuyuteriwa). (61) Miki meniuyutiwauni kememite'ununuiwaxi xapayaritsie, peru memika'utaxeiyarieki, mepika'upitiarie mawari wewiwamete memihikitiniki. (62) Kuwexinaruri pikawarupitia miki mawari mipatsietika memitekwaka, 'arike kepauka mawari wewiwame yamitayini 'iniari wewieti 'urimi meta tumimi heki. (63) Yunaiti memiyukuxeiri mepaki: huta tewiyari heimana huta miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari teiteri (42.360), (64) mekawa'iniatati wairiyarika te'uximayatamete 'ukari meta 'ukitsi, mikita 'atahuta miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'atahuta (7.337) mepiyupaimekai meta mekaniwarexeiyakaitini huta tsienituyari kwikamete 'ukitsi meta 'ukari. (65) Meta 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'ataxewi (736) kawayutsixi, meta huta tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana 'auxiwi (245) muratsixi, (66) nauka tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'auxiwi (435) kameyutsixi meta 'ataxewime miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari (6.720) puxuri. (67) Kepauka Kerutsareme memu'axia Yawé tukieya manuwekai, hipati 'ukirawetsixi meteniyetiani mitawewiyaniki tawarita Yawé tukieya meripaiti hakewa mewekai. (68) Kememiteheuyiwawekai mekateniyetuaxiani, 'uximayatsika tawarita muyutsutianiki: nauka tsienituyari heimana nauka tewiyari heimana 'atahaika (488) kiruyari huru (69) kanayani, huta miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana tamamata (2.750) kiruyari pirata kanayani meta xeitsienituyari paimeme mawari wewiwamete wakamixate. (70) Hiki mawari wewiwamete, rewitsixi meta hipati 'ixaheritsixi Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie menitiyaxe, peru kwikamete, kitenie tehiwemete meta tukita te'uximayatamete metatsiere hipati 'ixaheritsixi meneutayeixiani yukiekaritetsie meripaiti mematitekaitsie. Hipatita mekaniu'axiani Teri-Meraki me'anexiaka, Teri-Karitsa, Keruwi, 'Aruhuni meta 'Imexi, peru miki mepika'iyiwekaxia memiyutahekiataki kename 'ixaheritsixi mehiki: [cite: 69]
Rerahiyaxi xiiyarimama, Tuwiyaxi meta Nekura, yunaiti m [cite: 70]

Hipati mawari wewiwamete, wa'ukitsiema waxapayari pika'ukaxeiyarie mepika'iyiwekaxia 'ixaheritsixi memayuyeitiani: Kawahiyaxi, Kuhutsi meta Waxitsirahi wanuiwarima, ('iki 'imatirieka mieme xeime Karaha kiekame nu'aya kaniutiwitini Waxitsirahi mititewakai, hiki miki yumune hepai katiniuyuteriwa). [cite: 72]
Miki meniuyutiwauni kememite'ununuiwaxi xapayaritsie, peru memika'utaxeiyarieki, mepika'upitiarie mawari wewiwamete memihikitiniki. [cite: 73]
Kuwexinaruri pikawarupitia miki mawari mipatsietika memitekwaka, 'arike kepauka mawari wewiwame yamitayini 'iniari wewieti 'urimi meta tumimi heki. [cite: 77]
Yunaiti memiyukuxeiri mepaki: huta tewiyari heimana huta miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari teiteri (42.360), [cite: 78]

mekawa'iniatati wairiyarika te'uximayatamete 'ukari meta 'ukitsi, mikita 'atahuta miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'atahuta (7.337) mepiyupaimekai meta mekaniwarexeiyakaitini huta tsienituyari kwikamete 'ukitsi meta 'ukari. [cite: 79]
Meta 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'ataxewi (736) kawayutsixi, meta huta tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana 'auxiwi (245) muratsixi, [cite: 80]
nauka tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'auxiwi (435) kameyutsixi meta 'ataxewime miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari (6.720) puxuri. [cite: 81]
Kepauka Kerutsareme memu'axia Yawé tukieya manuwekai, hipati 'ukirawetsixi meteniyetiani mitawewiyaniki tawarita Yawé tukieya meripaiti hakewa mewekai. [cite: 82]
Kememiteheuyiwawekai mekateniyetuaxiani, 'uximayatsika tawarita muyutsutianiki: nauka tsienituyari heimana nauka tewiyari heimana 'atahaika (488) kiruyari huru [cite: 83]

kanayani, huta miriyari heimana 'atahuta tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana tamamata (2.750) kiruyari pirata kanayani meta xeitsienituyari paimeme mawari wewiwamete wakamixate. Hiki mawari wewiwamete, rewitsixi meta hipati 'ixaheritsixi Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie menitiyaxe, peru kwikamete, kitenie tehiwemete meta tukita te'uximayatamete metatsiere hipati 'ixaheritsixi meneutayeixiani yukiekaritetsie meripaiti mematitekaitsie. [cite: 87, 88]

'Atahutarieka metseritsie, kepaukari 'ixaheritsixi yunaiti yukiekaritetsie memeutayeixiakai hakewa memetitekai meripaiti, hiki Kerutsareme mekaniuyukuxeirieni kiekariyaritsie meyuxewiti. [cite: 90, 91, 92]

Hiki Ketsuha Kutsaraki nu'aya meta 'iwamama yunaiti, miki mawari wewiwamete memihikitikai, metatsiere Tsuruwaweri Tsaratiheri nu'aya meta 'iwamama yunaiti mekanitsutiani tawarita mekanitawewieni mawari taiyame 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya hetsiemieme, mana mawari taiyariyari memiwewietiweniki 'iniari niukiyari kemiraka'utiakai Muitsexi Kakaiyari ti'uximayatsiriwame. [cite: 93]

Matsi teiteri mana memitamakai mewamakati, mawari taiyame 'axeikia meniutawewieni meripaiti manuwekai. Hiki mana mitiyehane ximeri mawari taiyariyari Yawé hetsiemieme yamekateniuwewiximekaitini meta taikai. [cite: 94, 98]
Yaxeikiata kemire'uxa 'iniari niukiyaritsie kememite'u'aitiarie, Xamaru 'ixiarariyari mekaniuwewieni, mawari taiyariyari mekaniutiwewieni xexuime tukari hetsiemieme kemire'uxakai, [cite: 99]

yaxeikiatatsiere mekanitsutiani mawari taiyariyari xexuime tukaritsie yamireuyuhane, meta metseri manutahanitsie mawariyari meta 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa, Yawé kemitiu'aitaxi. Meta teiteri mawari mekaniwewiriekaitini meyuwairiyati. [cite: 100, 101]
'Akuxi tuki tenariyari katsutiariewekaku, 'atahuta metseritsie mexiakame tukaritsie teiteri menitsutianiri Yawé mawari taiyariyari mewewirieti. [cite: 102]

Hiki kii wewiwamete meta kiyeki te'uximayatamete tuminiki mekaniwarupitiani. Metatsiere Tsirunitari meta Tiru kiekatari 'ikwai, miti'iwa meta hatseiti mekaniwayetuirieni, kariuxa kiyeyari Riwanu mieme memi'atianiki Kupe hurawa haramaratsie me'eyenetiame, Peritsiya kwieyaritsie ti'aitame Tsiru kemitiuta'aitaxi. [cite: 104, 105]

Tsuruwaweri Tsaratiheri nu'aya, meta Ketsuha Kutsaraki nu'aya, meyiniti yunaiti wa'iwama, miki mawari wewiwamete mepihikitikai, meta rewitsixi meyiniti, yaxeikia yunaiti memehapaniekai memu'axiakai, mekanitsutiani tuki hutarieka memitawewieniki, hutarieka wiyaritsie hutarieka metseriyaritsie meteheutewiti Kerutsareme memu'axiatsie. Rewitsixi xeitewiyari wiyari [cite: 106, 107]

meutiyune memihitikatei mekaniuhiritiarieni memitaneniereniki kemiti'uximayatsiekai Yawé tukieya hetsiemieme. Hiki 'ayumieme Ketsuha, yuniwemati meta 'iwamama yunaiti, yaxeikiata Karimieri meta niwemama, miki Hurawiyaxi meminuiwarimamatikai, meta Henarari nuiwarimama, meta yuniwemati wa'iwama yunaiti, miki rewitsixi mepihikitikai, mekaniuyinini memitewa'aitiakaki te'uximayatamete Kakaiyari tukieya memiwewietiwe. [cite: 109, 112, 113]

Kepauka te'uximayatamete Yawé tukieya tenariyari memutsutia, mawari wewiwamete yukamixate mipatsietika me'anakatitikaiti meniu'axiani meta yukuxineta me'u'iti, metatsiere 'Atsahapi nuiwarimama rewitsixi meniu'axiani mutitiririka me'u'iti, miki 'ameniku'uni Yawé metaniawake, kemiraka'utiakai meripaiti Rawiri, ti'aitame matia 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie. [cite: 114]

Yawé pamipariyutsi mekanipitiakaitini yunaiti, meyuxewiti 'iki kwikari menikwikakaitini: <<Kakaiyari 'aixia pitiuka'iyari, 'Ixaheri mariweme- ki kemitinaki'erie yuheyemeki pinaki'erie». Yunaiti teiteri Yawé meniniawakaitini karima me'utihiwati mehehiaweti, tuki tenariyari 'ariri mutsutiariekaiki. [cite: 115, 116]

Yumiireti hipati mawari wewiwamete, rewitsixi meta hipati 'ukirawetsixi tuki matiari mieme memuxei, mehe'eriwati mekaniutitsuani waikawa kepauka tuki tenariyari hekwameki memuxei, mexi hipatita temawierikaki me'utihiwakai. [cite: 117]
Pikamatsiikikai hiwari xika temawierika hikitikaitini yati hiwerika, teiteri karima memutihiwakaiki, wahiwari 'ateewa paiti pi'eniiriikikai. [cite: 118, 122, 123]

Merikitsi kepauka Kura nuiwarimama meta Wenikamini nuiwarimama memiwaraye'unie mipai memitehetima kename memu'axiakai Wawiruniya memehapaniekai Yawé, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, tukieya mehewewietiwekai, hutarieka [cite: 121, 127, 129]

'ana Tsuruwaweri hetsia mekaniu'axiani meta huriyutsixi wa'ukiyarima wahixie, mipai mekateniwarutahiawe: -Xeketaneupitia temitetaparewieniki 'uximayatsikatsie, tameta xemeyexeiya Kakaiyari tekanayexeiyani, tame mawari taiyariyari tekaniwewirieka kepaukapaititi 'Etsaxikaruni 'ena mitatsi'atia, 'Atsiriya kwieyaritsie ti'aitame. [cite: 130, 131, 132]

Peritsi Tsuruwaweri, meta Ketsuha metatsiere 'ixaheritsixi eritsixi wa'ukiyarima mipai mekateniwaruta'eiya: -Tame xeme temixe'upitiani tepikayiwawe xemitatsiparewieniki takakaiyari tukieya hutarieka temitawewieniki. Tame teyuxaita tenenukuhanikuni Yawé tukieya, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, Tsiru kemitiu'aitaxi, Peritsiya kwieyaritsie ti'aitame. [cite: 133, 134]
Hiki miki mekanitsutiani mekayuwairiyame memiwarayeitianiki Kura teiteriyari mewamariutati kememite'uximayakai memitehayewaki. [cite: 135]

Mekateniupitiarieni paiti hipati 'ukirawetsixi 'ixatsitamete memitehayewaniki kememiteku'eriwakai. Mipai metenanuyehukaitini Tsiru ti'aitati kemireuterixi Peritsiyatsie ti'aitame, metatsiere Raríyu ti'aitakaku, ti'aitame tsiere miki matia Peritsiya kwieyaritsie. [cite: 137, 139, 140]
Yaxeikia kepauka mitsutia Kerikexi* ti'aitati, miki memiwaraye'unie xapa mekaneni'ani Kura kwieyaritsie meta Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie mewaxanetati. [cite: 141]

Meta kepauka 'Aritakexiketsi ti'aitame matia Peritsiya kwieyaritsie, yaxeikiata miki Witsirani, Mitiriratexi, Taweri meta hipati wa'iwama meyiniti xapa mekaneini'airieni, miki 'arameu niukiyariki kanakateriwarieni. [cite: 142]

Metatsiere, Xekuni kuyaxi tiwa'aitiwame meta Tsimitsahi ti'utiwame matia 'Aritakexiketsi xapa mekaneni'airieni Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie wahepaitsita raye'ukame. Xapa mipai kanayetainekaitini: [cite: 143, 146]

Xekuni kuyaxi tiwa'aitiwame meta Tsimitsahi ti'utiwame 'iki xapa teputa'utia, teyunaiti ta'iwama 'itsikate, kuwexinaruritsixi meta te'uximayatamete Peritsiyatsie, 'Ereki, Wawiruniya meta Tsutsa (tatsiari, 'eramitari). [cite: 147, 148]

'Iki xapa hepaitsita yaxeikia yamepiteha'eriwa hipati nuiwarite mumariwe ti'aitame 'Atsinapaxi muwa'atia Tsamariya kiekariyari mukama meta hipame kiekarite tau makayuyuipike hepatsie haa manuyeka 'Eupirate 'anutaiye. [cite: 149]
Ti'aitame 'Aritakexiketsi, mipai tepaitika mate'uximayatsiriwamete 'Eupirate 'anutaiye xemitama tau makayuyuipike hepatsie: [cite: 155]

Mipai tepimetehahiawe ti'aitame huriyutsixi pemiwareyeni'a mekaniu'axiani Kerutsareme, hiki miki kiekari mikaheu'ena mekanihekwatiatiweni 'axamitiuka'iyari. Tenariyari 'ariri kanitsutiarieka. [cite: 156]

Mipaita ketinemaika ti'aitame xika 'iki teiteri kiekari me'anukuhana meta xika kuraruyari me'inini, mana kiekatari mekaheu'enanati mepakine, mepikateyutuani kepemaine, meta mekateparewikuti mepakine, 'ayumieme mikiki 'uximatiarika pirayani 'atumini mukamariketsie 'aparatsiyuta. [cite: 157]
Tame te'a'uximayatsiriwamete temihimeki ti'aitame, tepikatawairiya mipai pemitinanaimarieka. 'Ayumieme 'iki xanetsika tepimatsiheni'airiwa. [cite: 159, 160]

'Eki ti'aitame ketineta'aita naiti xapa metixeiyarieniki kemitiiyi eniki kemitiiyi xapayarite hipati te'aitamete memanuka'ukaitsie mieme. 'Ana mipai pepiretimani 'iki kiekari kemikareu'enakai, kememite'ixani'eriekai te'aitamete meta hipati kiekarite 'auriena mumanetika, meta kaniuka'unarieni mana 'axati'aneti mitixuawekaiki. [cite: 161, 162]
'Ayumieme tekamenayehitiwani, xika miki kiekari 'anukuketiarieni meta kuraruyari xika 'inirieni, 'eki ti'aitame 'Eupirate 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipiketsie kepemiti'aita pekaneiyehiamiki. [cite: 163]

Waruta'eiyaka, ti'aitame mipai kaniwaru'utiirieni: Xehetsiemieme Xekuni kuyaxi tiwa'aitiwame meta ti'utiwame Tsimitsahi, meta xe'iwama Tsamariya kiekatari, meta hipati haa 'Eupirate 'anutaiye xemititei tau makayuyuipike: Nepixewairitia. [cite: 164, 169, 170]
Xeme xapa xeminetsiheyeni'airi, 'akateriwarieka putahekiatsie nehixie. [cite: 172, 173]
'Ari nepitiuta'aitaxi xapate mitixeiyarieniki, mipai pitiuyi, tepikaxei miki kiekaritsie meripaiti 'axamiti'ane pitixuawekai, meta te'aitamete mepikawareu'eniekai, [cite: 174]

meta kename Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie te'aitamete metirikawiti me'utixuawerixi, memite'aitakai naitsarie tau makayuyuipike hepatsie haa 'Eupirate manuyeka 'anutaiye naime kwieyaritsie, mepitekupitiariwakai waheki, meta mepiteyetuiriyariwakai, meta memiteyuniitiakai mepitekupitiariwakai 'anamakame. [cite: 175]
'Ayumieme, xeketenewareta'aitia miki teiteri memitehehayewaki yu'uximayatsika, mekeheihayewa tawarita mehewewietiweti, kepaukake ne hekwameki 'aitsika waxapa hikitime nemitawewieni. [cite: 177]
Yapauka xeketenaye'atia 'iki kenemixerahiawe hepaitsita, para kwinimieme 'iki 'uximatiarika mikati'aneniki reuyeweniki kemitiyetuiwa tumini neparatsiyuta. [cite: 178]
Kepauka ti'aitame 'Aritakexiketsi xapaya makateriwarie Xekuni hixie meta ti'utiwame Tsimitsahi metatsiere wa'iwama, miki yunaiti [cite: 179]

Kerutsareme mekanekine, mewakwikuti 'ixiparaki, huriyutsixi wairiyarika mekaniwaripitiani memitehayewaki yu'uximayatsika. Mipai 'ayumieme 'uximayatsika mekaniuhayewa Kakaiyari tukieya mewewietiweti Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie, kepaukake Rariyu miti'aitakai hutarieka wiyari. [cite: 183, 184]

Hiki Kakaiyari niukametemama Hakehuxi meta Tsakariyaxi 'Iru nu'aya mekateniwarutaxatiani huriyutsixi Kura memitamakai meta Kerutsareme, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya hetsiemieme mekaniutiyuanekaitini kename wata'iwiyakai. [cite: 187]

Hiki 'ayumieme Tsuruwaweri Tsaratiheri nu'aya meta Ketsuha Kutsaraki nu'aya mekanitsutiani tawarita Kakaiyari tukieya mewewietiweti Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie. Kakaiyari niukametemama wahamatia mekaniu'uwakaitini mewaparewieti. [cite: 188, 189]

'Ana tukariyaritsie kwitiwa, Tatenahi 'Eupirate 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipike hepatsie kuwexinaruri, meta Tsetaxi-Wutsinahi metatsiere wa'iwama, huriyutsixi wahetsia mekaniye'axiani, mipai mekateniwaruta'iwawiya: <<¿Kemi'ane pixe'upitia 'iki tuki hekwameki xemitawewieniki, meta hekwameki xemenukuketianiki?>>> [cite: 190]
Tawarita mipai mekateniwaruta'iwawiya: «¿Kehapai metetetewa 'uximayatsika memi'aita miki tuki hekwameki memanukuketiaxime?>>> [cite: 191]
Matsi huriyutsixi wa'ukiyarima Kakaiyari miwa'iwiyakaiki, wairiyarika mepika'upitiarie memitehayewaki yu'uximayatsika kepaukake Rariyu yamitayinikekai xapatsie. [cite: 192, 196]
Hiki Tatenahi, miki kwieyaritsie kuwexinaruri, meta Tsetaxi-Wutsinahi meta wa'iwama, kuwiyexinu parewiwamete miki kwieyaritsie, ti'aitame Rariyu xapa mekaneni'airieni, [cite: 197]
mipai hayetaineme: Ti'aitame Rariyu hetsiemieme: Tepimatsiwairitia. [cite: 198, 199, 200]

Ti'aitame mipai pemitimaikaki tepimatehaxaxatiwa Kura kwieyaritsie tepanuki, Kakaiyari mimariwe tukieya manuwekai, hiki tekaneixeiya hekwameki kanewewiyaneni tetexi 'anenemeki, meta herie mexa kanekamariwani. Miki 'uximayatsika yemeki me'ikweriwayurieti mekatene'uximayaka, peru yapauka mekateneyurieka. [cite: 201, 202, 203]
Tekaniwareta'iwawiya wa'ukiyarima kemi'ane pixetiuta'aitia 'iki tuki hekwameki manukuketiarieniki, [cite: 204]
meta kemetetetewa miki 'uximayatsika memi'aita, 'eki ti'aitame temimatsi'aka'utiirieniki. [cite: 205]

Miki mipai mepitateheta'ei: <<Kakaiyari taheima miti'aita meta kwiepa tekateni'uximayatsiriwametetini, hikita hutarieka tuki tekaniwewietiweni meripaiti mutawewiyakai miniriekai miixa kananuyemieni xewiti mariweti 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie ti'aitame kanita'aita. [cite: 206, 207]

Peru meripaiti kiekatari ta'ukiyarima Kakaiyari taheima makawe mekaniuyeha- xiatiani, miki Nawukurunutsuxi mamayatsie kaniwayetuani, ti'aitame Wawiruniya kwieyaritsie kiekame hetsia, miki karireu tewiyari tuki kaniuka'una meta teiteri kaniwarehapani 'ena kiekatari Wawiruniya kwieyaritsie paiti. [cite: 211, 212]
>>Peru 'arikeke, xeiwiyari Tsiru ti'aitati, Wawiruniya kwieyaritsie, mipai katiniuta'aita 'iki Kakaiyari tukieya manukuhanieniki tawarita. [cite: 213]

Meta Wawiruniya tukieyata katiniwayepi- ini piinite, huruki, pirataki, mitiwewiyatika Nawukurunutsuxi tukita mirewayepikai Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie, Wawiruniya tukieyata pita mireutapikai, hiki Tsetsiwatsaxi katiniyetuirieni kuwexinaruriki mitahiawekai 'ena. [cite: 214]
Hiki Tsiru, Tsetsiwatsaxi katiniuta'aitiani miki naime piinite tukita mitiyetuaniki, meta ke'itawewienike hutarieka tuki meripaiti hakewa mewekai. [cite: 215]
Hiki 'ayumieme Tsetsiwatsaxi Kerutsareme kaninuani kanikatsutiani Kakaiyari tukieya tenariyari. 'Anamitiyehane katini'uximatsieka, peru 'akuxi kapiniriewe». [cite: 216]

Kamitsi tame mipai tekanaitikani Ti'aitame xika 'aixia 'aneni, xapa ke'utixeiyarieni waxapatsie Wawiruniyatsie te'aitamete miraka'utiarie kemitiuyi, yatemitehetimaniki xika 'aku yuritini ti'aitame Tsiru tiuta'aita Kakaiyari tukieya hekwameki mitawewiyaniki Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie. [cite: 217, 218, 222, 223]
Hiki Rariyu ti'aitame katiniuta'aita Wawiruniyatsie xapate mititixeiyarieniki kiita mitiwati'utsiwatsie. [cite: 232]
Hiki 'Ewatana paratsiyuyata, Meriya kwieyaritsie, xapa kwikwieti kaniutaxeiyarieni mipai katinaye'ukaitini: [cite: 234]

Mexiakame wiyari ti'aitati, ti'aitame Tsiru 'iki xapa kaniutawewieni Kakaiyari tukieya Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie muwe hepaitsita: Tuki tenariyari ke'utsutiarieni, tawarita ke'utawewiyani muwa mawari taiyariyari mitiwewiwaniki. Xeitewiyari heimana 'atahuta meturuyari pexeiyani mipai heutitewati meta mipai 'atayeuti, [cite: 235, 236]
haika xurukuyari pexeiyani tetexi 'aminene, meta xeixurukuyari mexa. Naiti tita mana reuyeweti mirayani tinayukatuiyamiki tumini 'ena paratsiyuta miemeki. [cite: 237]

Meta piinite huruki mitiwewiyatika meta pirataki Nawukurunutsuxi mirewayeti tukita Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie, Wawiruniya pita mirepi, tawarita kehetikieni Kerutsareme, Kakaiyari tukieyata kereutapiyani, hakewa matsi memieme. [cite: 238]

Hiki ti'aitame Rariyu kuwexinaruri Tatenahi mipai katiniuta'aitiani 'Eupirate 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipike hepatsie miti'aita, metatsiere Tsetaxi-Wutsinahi meta wa'iwama, kuwexinaruri hamatia memite'uximayakai miki kwieyaritsie: [cite: 242]

Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie xepikahe'uwani Kakaiyari tukieya mawewiyanetsie xepikateheyu'uximatiaka. Xekeniwarehayewa kuwexinaruri Kura kiekame meta huriyutsixi wa'ukiyarima tuki memetawewieniki hutarieka meripaiti manuwekaitsie. [cite: 244]
Metatsiere mipai nepaine xemeta xepiwareparewieni, xeteheyutiati tita mireuyeweka tuki manukuketiarieniki, tuminiki miki kwieyaritsie xemiteyukutiayaki 'ena paratsiyuta. [cite: 245]
'Exepikateheutewini reuyewekaku tukitsie timieme xeketeneyutua, 'uximayatsika mikahewakekaniki. [cite: 246]

Metatsiere, xepiwareyetuiriwani tsikerutsixi, muxatsi 'ukitsi, muxatsi tirixi, mawari taiyariyari memakineki Kakaiyari taheima makawe hetsiemieme, nixeime tukaritsie mepikaheuyeweka, meta tiriku heutinikame, 'una, kaxie winuyari, meta hatseiti, naime tita memiteheuyehiaka, mawari wewiwamete kememaitikanitsi Kerutsareme memetitei. [cite: 248]
Mipaita meta nekanaineni, kemi'ane 'iki 'aitsika mikahaye'atiani, miki kiyetsie kekaxuiyani, kiye kiiya hetsie 'anuyehanieme meta kiiya ke'uka'unarieni. [cite: 253]

Kakaiyari Kerutsareme kananayexeiya mana memeyexeiyaniki, ke'ika'una ti'aitame kemi'ane yatini hipati teiteri 'iki 'aitsika 'axamuyurieni yatini xika Kakaiyari tukieya kemi'ane mika'unamikini. [cite: 254]

Merikite kuwexinaruri Tatenahi 'Eupirate 'anutaiye miti'aitakai tau makayuyuipike hepatsie, meta Tsetaxi-Wutsinahi meta wa'iwama, kuwexinaruri hamatia memite'uximayakai miki kwieyaritsie, ti'aitame Rariyu kemitiwaru'aitia mipai metenaye'atiani kemire'ukai. [cite: 257]

'Ayumieme huriyutsixi wa'ukiyarima memanuyetekai meniyiwawekaitini memiyeweiyani 'uximayatsika meta memininiki, kememaitikatei Kakaiyari niukametemama Hakehuxi meta Tsakariyaxi 'Iru nu'aya. [cite: 258]
Mekaninini tuki hutarieka mieme, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya kemitiwaru'aitiakai meta te'aitamete Peritsiya kiekatari Tsiru, Rariyu yaxeikia 'Aritakexiketsi. [cite: 259]
Rariyu ti'aitametikaku 'ataxewirieka wiyarit- sie, tuki manukuhanie hutarieka kaniunirieni hairieka tukaritsie 'araxi metseriyaritsie. [cite: 260]

Hiki 'ixaheritsixi mawari wewiwamete hipati memu'axiakai -tatsiari yunaiti rewitsixi meta memehapaniekai-, waikawameki meyutemamawieti Kakaiyari tukieya hetsiemieme 'ixiarari mekaniuwewieni. [cite: 261, 262, 266]

Kakaiyari 'ixiarari mekaniuwewirieni 'imikieri mawariyari, xeitsienituyari tsikerutsixi, huta tsienituyari muxatsi 'ukitsi, muxatsi 'etsimemipepe nauka tsienituyari, meta tamamata heimana huta tsipuri, kememiyupaimekai 'Ixaheri nuiwarimama, 'itiya mawariyari memakineki yuxexuiti 'axamemite'uyuriki memiteheuyehiwiyarieniki. [cite: 267]

Meta, kemire'uxa Muitsexi xapateyatsie, mawari wewiwamete mekaniwaru'uitiani kememite'uximayaka meta rewitsixi kememiteyuriekakekai, kepauka memiyukuxexeiriwani memuyutinenewiwanitsie Kakaiyari hetsiemieme Kerutsareme. [cite: 268]
Memu'axiakai memehapaniekai Patsikwa 'ixiarariyari mekaniuwewieni mexiakame metseritsie tamamata heimana nauka tukariyaritsie. [cite: 270]

Mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsixi meyiniti 'aixia mekaniuyuyurieni, hiki me'uyu'itieka, Patsikwa 'ixiarariyariitsie muxa 'etsimupe mekaniumi- eni, yunaime wahetsiemieme memu'axiakai memehapaniekai, meta yu'iwama mawari wewiwamete wahetsiemieme meta yuhetsiemieme. [cite: 271]

'Atahuta tukari waikawa meyutemamawieti paa mikakuxanariyarietika 'ixiarariyari mekaniwewiekaitini, Yawé tawarita temawierika muwarupitiakaiki meta ti'aitame Peritsiyatsie miti'aita miwaruparewiekaiki yamitiuyuriki meta miwarupitiaki 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya tukieya hutarieka memanukuhanaki. [cite: 276, 277]
Merikitsi 'Aritakexiketsi ti'aitametikaku Peritsiya kwieyaritsie, mana xewiti tewi kaniuyeikakaitini 'Etsitiraxi titewati, Tserahiyaxi nu'aya, 'Atsariyaxi nu'aya, Kirikiyaxi nu'aya, [cite: 280]
Tsaruni nu'aya, Tsaruki nu'aya, 'Akituwi nu'aya, [cite: 281]
'Amariyaxi nu'aya, 'Atsariyaxi nu'aya, Merayuti nu'aya, [cite: 282]
Tserahiyaxi nu'aya, 'Utsihi nu'aya, Wukihi nu'aya, [cite: 283]
'Awitsuha nu'aya, Pinexi nu'aya, 'Eriyatsaxi nu'aya meta 'Aruni nu'aya mawari wewiwame mexiakame matia. [cite: 284]

'Iki 'Etsitiraxi kaninuani Wawiruniya 'aneka. Ti'ukitame kanihikitikaitini 'aitsika 'iniari niukiyari naime makumaikai Yawé 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya Muitsexi mupitia. Ti'aitame waikawa kaninaki'eriekaitini, Yawé Kakaiyari hamatiana kaniuyeikakaitini. [cite: 285, 286]

Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie hipati 'ixaheritsixi 'Etsitiraxi matia mekaniu'axiani hipati mawari wewiwamete, rewitsixi, kwikamete, kitenie tehiwemete meta tukita te'uximayatamete menihikitikaitini. 'Iki mipai katiniiyini 'atahuta wiyari 'Aritakexiketsi ti'aitakaku. [cite: 288, 289, 292]
'Etsitiraxi kaninuani Kerutsareme 'auxiwirieka metseriyaritsie 'atahuta wiyari 'Aritakexiketsi ti'aitakaku. [cite: 293, 294]

Wawiruniya kanayeyakaitini mexiakame tukaritsie mexiakame metseritsie, Kerutsareme kaninuani mexiakame tukaritsie 'auxiwirieka metseriyaritsie, Kakaiyari 'aixia 'anemeki miparewiekaiki meta hamatiana mumiekaiki. [cite: 295]
'Etsitiraxi yemeki Yawé 'aitsikaya kaniuyuti'ikitiakaitini, meta mipai katiniuyeikakaitini meta 'ixaheritsixi niwa'ikitiakaitini miki 'iniari niukiyarite. [cite: 296]
Ti'aitame 'Aritakexiketsi xapa 'Etsitiraxi kaniyetuirieni, miki mawari wewiwame nihikitikaitini meta ti'ikitame 'iniari niukiyari hepaitsita Yawé 'ixaheritsixi muwayetuiri: [cite: 297]

'Aritakexiketsi, te'aitamete tiwa'aitiwame, 'Etsitiraxi nekametini'utiirieka, pemimawari wewiwame meta pemiti'ikitame Kakaiyari taheima makawe 'aitsikaya hepaitsita: Nekameniwairitiaka. [cite: 298, 299]
Mipai nepaine kemi'ane 'ixaheritsixi memeikinikuni Kerutsareme 'ahamatia memiyehuki mepiyiwawe, tsepa mawari wewiwamete meta rewitsixi meyunaiti. [cite: 300]

Ne ti'aitame meta 'atahuta netsi'ixatsitiwamete tepimatsini'a peminierimieki kememe'ane Kerutsareme meta Kura kwieyaritsie 'iniari niukiyari kemaine Kakaiyari 'aitsikaya hetsiena pemitiwiya. [cite: 301, 306]
Huru meta pirata kenatiti ne, ti'aitame, meta netsi'ixatsitiwamete temiyetua ketemiteyuwairiya 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya hetsiemieme, Kerutsareme muyeika. [cite: 307]

Meta kenatiti naime purata meta huru Wawiruniya kwieyaritsie pemikaxeiya, yinikame mana memitama teiteri memiteyetiaxiani meta mawari wewiwamete memiteyetuaxiani 'akakaiyari tukieya hetsiemieme Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie mewe. [cite: 308]

Miki tuminiki ketiniwaretinanai, memikateheuyewekaki, tsikerutsixi, muxatsi 'ukitsi meta muxatsi türixi meta hatsite mawariyari meta kaxie winuyari, mawari taiyametsie xemitehetimawaniki Kakaiyari tukieyata Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie. [cite: 309]
Mireyuhayewa piratate meta hurute 'eki meta 'a'iwama tsepa kexemeiyuri kehapai 'aixia me'aneni, peru xekakaiyari kemitinake xeikia. [cite: 310]
Perutsi xeikia tukita piinite petineu- tapimiki mitipatsietika pemitiyetuiriyarie, me'ayumiemetetiniki 'akakaiyari tukieya hetsiemieme Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie. [cite: 311]
Tawarita tixaiti reuyeweti xika rayani 'akakaiyari tukieyatsie timieme, ti'aitame tuminieyaki katinayukatuiyamiki. [cite: 312]

Meta mipai nekanaineni, ne ti'aitame 'Aritakexiketsi, mipai nekatina'aitani, yunaiti tu- mini 'iwemete 'Eupirate 'anutaiye xemitama tau makayuyuipike hepatsie, yapauka xeteneyu- tuakuni kepaimeme meta'iwauni yatini tita mireta'iwauni 'Etsitiraxi mawari wewiwame meta ti'ikitame Kakaiyari taheima makawe 'ait- sikaya kemaine hepaitsita. [cite: 313, 316]

Xemeiyetuirieni kaniyiweni tsepa haika miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari kiruyari pirata, xeitewiyari heimana huta miriyari rituruyari tiriku, huta miriyari heimana huta tsienituyari rituruyari kaxie winuyari, huta miriyari heimana huta tsienituyari rituruyari hatseiti, meta naime 'una kepaimeti meuyeweka. [cite: 317]
Kakaiyari taheima makawe naime kemitixe'uta'aitia yutuki hetsiemieme, yapauka yaxeteneyuri, mipai mikaha'akaki ne, ti'aitame, nemira'aitatsie meta neniwema wahepaitsita. [cite: 318]
Meta mipai nepitixe'aitia, xepikawarewiyani mawari wewiwamete, rewitsixi, kwikamete, kitenie tehiwemete meta Kakaiyari tukieyata te'uximayatamete yunaime. [cite: 319, 320]

Merikite 'eki 'Etsitiraxi, Kakaiyari mimatsipitia pemitimaiweniki, 'ahet- tininakeni sie te'uximayatamete pemiwaranayexeiyaki meta 'itsikate mana kiekatari wahetsiemieme 'Eupirate 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipike hepatsie memitama, yunaime Kakaiyari 'aitsikaya memimate wahetsiemieme nekanaineni. Hipatita kemi'ane memika'imate keniwareti'ikitia. [cite: 321, 323, 324]

Xika xewiti 'akakaiyari 'aitsikaya kahanu'enieni meta ne, ti'aitame, ne'aitsika, yapauka yaketineuta'aita mimierieniki, yatini yukwietsie mayeweiyarieniki, yupiinite mitinawaiyarieniki yatini manutahiiyaniki. [cite: 325, 326]
Yawé 'aixia ke'itiarieka ta'ukiyarima meripaiti memu'uwakai wakakaiyari, ti'aitame 'iyarieya muyuitia witsi'anekame kanayeitiani tukieya hepaitsita Kerutsaremetsie. [cite: 331]

Hawaiki kahau'akameki netsinaki'erieti, miki pinetsi'upitia 'aixia 'anemeki ti'aitame minetsixeiyaniki, meta 'i'ixatsitiwamete yaxeikia yunaiti te'uximayatamete hetsiana memimamariwawe 'aixia meminetexeiyaniki. [cite: 332]
Yawé nekakaiyari nehamatia muyeikakaiki, nepitirikariyarie hiki 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima neniwarukuxeirieni Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsie meminetsi'anuweiyaki». [cite: 333]
'Iki mekanihikitini 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima kepauka 'Aritakexiketsi ti'aitakaku nehamatia Wawiruniya memiyeki Kerutsareme temu'axia, kemaine kememite'ununuiwaxi waxapayari: [cite: 339]
Pinexi nuiwarieyatsie mieme: Keritsuni, 'Itamaxi hetsiemieme: Tanieri, Rawiri hetsiemieme: Katuxi, [cite: 340]
Tsekaniyaxi tiiriyamama hetsie mimiemetikai. Parutsi hetsiemieme: Tsakariyaxi meta xeitsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana tamamata teiteri hamatiana memayuka'utia. [cite: 341]
Pakati-Muhawi hetsiemiemete: 'Erihuhenahi miki Tserahiyaxi munu'ayatikai meta huta tsienituyari teiteri. [cite: 342]
Tsekaniyaxi hetsiemieme: Kahatsieri nu'aya meta haika tsienituyari teiteri hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 346]
'Arini hetsiemiemete: 'Eweri miki Kunatani munu'ayatikai meta huta tewiyari heimana tamamata teiteri hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 347]
'Erami hetsiemieme: Kitsariyaxi 'Atahariyaxi nu'aya, meta teiteri haika tewiyari heimana tamamata meyupaimeti hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 348]
Tsepatiyaxi hetsiemieme: Tsewariyaxi Mikaheri nu'aya meta nauka tewiyari hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 349]
Kuhawi hetsiemieme: 'Awiriyaxi Kehieri nu'aya meta teiteri huta tsienituyari heimana tamamata heimana 'atahaika hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 350]
Tserumiti hetsiemieme: Kutsipiyaxi nu'aya meta teiteri xeitsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 351]
Wewahi hetsiemieme: Tsakariyaxi Wewahi nu'aya meta teiteri xeitewiyari heimana 'atahaika meyupaimeti hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 352]
'Atsikari hetsiemieme: Kuhanahani Hakatani nu'aya meta xeitsienituyari heimana tamamata teiteri hamatiana memu'axia. [cite: 353]
'Arunikani hetsiemiemete: 'Eripereti, Keyeri meta Tsemahiyaxi, 'imatirieka miemete 'iki nuiwaritsie, meta wahamatia haika tewiyari teiteri menayuka'utiani. [cite: 354]
Wihiwahi hetsiemiemete: 'Utahi, Tsawuri meta teiteri haika tewiyari heimana tamamata meyupaimeti wahamatia menayuka'utiani. [cite: 355]
'Iki 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima nekaniwarukuxeirieni 'aki haa muhane 'aurie 'Ahawa hayaritsie meuyekuke, mana tetiteti haika tukari tekaniuyurieni. [cite: 360]

Hiki 'ayumieme neniwarukuxeirieni 'Eriyetsexi, 'Ariheri, Tsemahiyaxi, 'Erinatani, Kariwi, 'Erinatani, Natani, Tsakariyaxi meta Metsurani, mana memititekai wa'ukiyarima memihikitikai meta nekaniwaruta'inieni Kuyariwi meta 'Erinatani miki te'ikitamete, [cite: 362]

miki 'Irirú hetsia nekaniwareni'ani Katsipiya kiekatari wa'ukiyari hetsia. Mipai nekatiniwaruhiritiani, Hiru meta 'iwamama Katsipiyatsie memanuyetei yunaime, memiwaretawawirieniki te'uximayatamete takakaiyari tukita. [cite: 363, 364, 365]
Kakaiyari mitatsiparewiekaiki, xeime 'ixaheri tewiyari metaneyeni'airieni yemeki rakumaikame Tserewiyaxi titewakame Makiri nu'aya, Rewi nuiwarieyatsie mieme. [cite: 366]

Hamatiana meniu'axiani niwemama meta 'iwamama, meyunaiti tamamata heimana 'atahaika mekaniyupaimekaitini. Metatsiere mepitatsiheyeni'airi Katsawiyaxi meta Kitsariyaxi, miki Merari nuiwarimama mepihikitikai, waniwema mepiwaraweiyakai meta wa'iwama, yunaiti xeitewiyari mepiyupaimekai. [cite: 367, 368]

Metatsiere, Rawiri meta 'iparewiwamete meyunaiti hipame memiwarutihiawekai rewitsixi memiwaparewiekaki, miki mekataneyeni'airieni huta tsienituyari heimana xeitewiyari meyupaimeme teparewiwamete, miki mekanaka'utiarieni kememitetetewakai. [cite: 369, 373]

Hiki, haa 'Ahawa manuyeka heutahurakaki tetiteti, neniwaruta'aitiani temitahakieniki takakaiyari hixie tixaiti temikatehayuyeitianiki, meta temitawawirieniki huyeta tahamatia miyemieki, tame, taniwema, yaxeikiata tapiinite ti'iwiyati. [cite: 374]

Yemeki, nepenetitewiyaxi ti'aitame hetsia xeikuyaxiyari kawayatsixi wahetsie me'utekame newaretawaunike memitatsi'aye'unie wahepaitsita memitatsihe'iwiyaniki, ti'aitame yatemitehahiawekaikiri kename Kakaiyari wa'iwiya kemi'ane hetsiena yuri memite'erie, peru meta kename kemi'ane Kakaiyari 'uximatiarika wakupitiwa. [cite: 375, 376, 378]
Hiki 'ayumieme tekaniuyuhakieni meta tekaniyunenewiekaitini takakaiyari tewawirieti mitatsi'iwiyaniki, mikita kataniu'enieni. [cite: 381]
'Arike nekaniwaranayexeiya tamamata heimana huta mawari wewiwamete wa'ukiyarima memakine: Miki Tserewiyaxi, Katsawiyaxi meta tamamata wa'iwama. [cite: 382, 383]

Miki wahixie huru neniuti'iniata kemireuhapanakai, piinite mitipatsietika meta memiteyetua ti'aitame meta 'i'ixatsitiwamete, 'iparewiwamete memimamariwawe meta 'ixaheritsixi mana memenenierekai memiteheyetua piinite Kakaiyari tukieyatsie timieme. [cite: 384, 385]

Nemitiuti'iniataxi kemirahetekai 'ipai katinipaimekaitini: xeitewiyari heimana xewi miriyari heimana nauka tsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana tamamata kiruyari pirata, piinite pirataki mitiwewiyatika haika miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari kiruyari pirahetekai, meta huru haika miriyari heimana haika tsienituyari kiruyari, [cite: 387, 391]
xeitewiyari huru watsuyari 'atahaika kiruyari mirahetekai, meta hutame wurunitse xariteyari witsi'aneneme, huru hepai witsitiyuxexeiyame. [cite: 392]

Hiki mipai nekatiniwarutahiawe: «Xeme meta piinite Yawé hetsia miemete xekanakine xepatsieti. Pirata meta huru 'imikieri kanihikitini Yawé hetsia miyetuiya kememiteyuwairiya, miki Yawé ta'ukiyarima wakakaiyari hetsiemieme. [cite: 393, 394]

Xeme xeketene'iwiyani meta xeketene'utani kepaukake hutarieka meti'iniatsieni Yawé tukieyata Kerutsareme paiti, mawari wewiwamete mexiakate wahixie, meta rewitsixi metatsiere 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima wahixie». [cite: 395]
Hiki mawari wewiwamete yaxeikia rewitsixi metenanupiini pirata, huru meta piinite hipame mitiuti'iniatsiekai miranitikieniki takakaiyari tukieyata Kerutsareme paiti. [cite: 396]

Merikite tamamata heimana huta metseritsie tukariyaritsie mexiakame 'Ahawa hayaritsie tekaniyekine Kerutsareme tehekineka. Ketemite'iki tahuyeta Kakaiyari tahamatia kaniumiekaitini, katane'iwiyakaitini memitatsi'aye'unie meta tenawayamete wahepaitsita. [cite: 397, 399]
Kerutsareme te'uta'axiaka haika tukari teni'uxipiekaitini. [cite: 403]

Naurieka tukaritsie pirata, huru, meta hipame piinite teteniuti'iniata takakaiyari tukieyata, hiki naime teteniyetuani mawari wewiwame Meremuti hetsia 'Uriyaxi nu'aya. 'Eriyatsaxi Pinexi nu'aya mana pinierekai hamatiana pakatei, meta rewitsixi Kutsawari Ketsuha nu'aya, meta Nuhariyaxi Winuhi nu'aya. [cite: 404, 405]
'Ana tukaritsie naime teteniuti'iniata kemireuhapanakai meta naime teteniuti'iniata kemitipaimekai, meta naiti kemirahetekai kanaka'utsieni. [cite: 406]

Hiki, Yawé hetsiemiemeta, 'ixaheritsixi takakaiyari, memehapaniekai 'ari memu'axiakai mawari taiyariyari mekaniuwewieni meta 'itiya mawariyari yunaiti keyupaimeti memu'axia, meniwarutimawa tsikerutsixi tamamata heimana huta, nauka tewiyari heimana tamamata 'ataxewi muxatsi 'ukitsi, haika tewiyari heimana tamamata heimana 'atahuta muxatsi 'etsimemipepe meta tsipuri tamamata heimana huta. [cite: 407]

Meta ti'aitame 'aitsikaya meniyetuani hiritiariekate mana memuwetikatei wahetsia meta mana mukuwexinaruritikai hetsia 'Eupirate 'anutaiye tau makayuyuipike hepatsie, mikita naimeki meniwaruparewieni teiteri meta Kakaiyari tukieya hetsiemieme. [cite: 408, 409]

Merikitsi 'arike, 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima 'ahurawa mekanakine, mipai mekaneteniutahiawe: <<<'Ixaheritsixi meta mawari wewiwamete metatsiere rewitsixi, mepikayiwawe memikawanikaki miki teiteri 'ena hurawa kiekatari, matsi pita kememiteyurie wahepai naime 'axameteniyurieka, kananeutsixi wayeiyari meta hetitsixi, peretseutsixi, kewutseutsixi, 'amunitsixi, muhawitsixi, 'ekipitutari meta 'amuxeutsixi. [cite: 418, 419, 420]

Meta miki waniwema 'ukari mekaniwarutiwitini yaxeikiata mana yuniwema mekaniwaneikitiatiweni, mipai Kakaiyari teiterimama mekateniwaniitiatiweni 'ena memitama teiteri wahamatia. Kemi'ane meri memite'ukatsutia 'axameteyurieti mekanihikitini 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima meta kuwexinaruritsixi». [cite: 421, 422]
Hiki kepauka 'iki nemitiu'eni, nekamixa nemu'utsie ne'ixuriki nekaneukatsana, nekipate nekaniukahuna meta nemixiya, hiki waikawameki nenutuixieti neniutitunumakeni. [cite: 423, 424, 425]
Hiki meta, 'ukirawetsixi memanuyetei 'axamemite'uyuriki, mekaniyukuxeirieni ne'aurie keyupaimeti Kakaiyarieya niukieya memi'eniekai. yunaiti 'Ixaheri [cite: 426, 427, 428, 431, 432, 433]

Netsieti yaxeikia neniyuhiweriekaitini kepaukake taikai maye'a mawari mawewiwatsie. Kepauka mawari taikai mieme maye'a 'anake nekaniunenitiani, nekamixa meta 'ixuriki meukatsatsani ne'anakatiti, nekaniukatunumakeni, teiki nekanemeni Yawé nekakaiyari hetsia, [cite: 434, 435, 436]

nenewieriki mipai nekatinitahiawe: <<Nekakaiyari, nepuyuxamurie meta nepeunetewiya mutimiirixiki matsi teyunaime, tahetsie pitatsi'anukateukixi ke'axatemite'uyuri pitatsi'anukateukixi 'axatemite'uhipa muyuawitsiepairi kaniye'ani. [cite: 437, 442]

Kepauka paititi ta'ukiyarima 'axamemite'uyuri meta hiki 'akuxi, ke'axatemite'uyuri pimariwe. 'Axatemite'uyuriki, tame, meta tate'aitiwamete, metatsiere mawari wewiwamete, tekaniyetuiyani hipame te'aitamete ta'aurie memitama wahetsia. 'Ixiparaki tepite'ukwinixi, 'ateewa tepehapanie, tepitenawatsiyarie meta tenanaimarieti, hiki 'akuxi ketemite'anuyehu. [cite: 443, 444, 445]

>>Hiki perutsi 'eki Yawé, takakaiyari, 'eki 'aixia pepitiuka'iyari tahetsiemieme, yayupaimeme pemiwarupitiaki pemiwaruxinaxiki 'ateiterima temitahayewatiwe meta pemanuyeika makupatsie memi'axianiki. Pepitatsi'upitia hekiariya hekwame temixeiyaniki meta 'etsiwa nitiarika pepitatsi'upitia wairiyarika te'uximayatamete tehikitikaku. [cite: 446, 447]

Tsepaneti wairiyarika temite'uximayatamete, pepikatatsi'uku'eiri, takakaiyari, matsi pita kepemitiyukanenimaya matsiikime pepayeitia tahetsie Peritsiya kwieyaritsie te'aitamete wahixie. Hekwame tukari pekataniupitiani 'atuki hekwameki temanukuketianiki, 'aixia temiyurieniki muka'unarie, meta pepitatsi'iwiya Kura kwieyaritsie yaxeikia Kerutsaremetsie. [cite: 448, 449]
>>Merikite hiki, miya temite'uyuri, ¿keri hiki temetetahiawe? 'A'aitsikatsie yatepikatekaki [cite: 450]

pemitatsiyetuiri 'aniukamete yamete'aka'utiwakaku, kepauka mipai pepitarayehitia: Kwie xema'iwatsie ka'itiyati kanexuaweni mana teiteri memitama mepika'itiya, naitsarie kwieyari kemiyewa 'axamiti'ane mekatenihiniyani. [cite: 451, 454]

'Ayumieme xeme yuniwema 'ukari meta 'ukitsi, xepikawapitiaka mana memitama memiwarutiwitikiniki. Hatsuaku tima miki xepikawareparewieka kayuwati memu'uwaniki meta memitehexeiyaniki, xeme pita xetirikaiyeti xemuhuniki meta miki kwieyari 'aixia mi'anetsie timieme xemitetikwaniki, hiki 'ariketa yuniwema xemiwaku'eiririeniki yuheyemeki. [cite: 455, 456]

Ketemite'anuyeki 'axatemite'uyuriki 'axatemite'u'iyariki, mipai tepitehetima 'eki, takakaiyari, 'akuxi 'uximatiarika pepikatatsiyetuiriewe yemeki mitahetsiemieme, matsi pita yateyupaimeti temiyuhayewaki pekataniupitiani. [cite: 457, 458]

¿Ketiyiwekuta tawarita 'a'aitsika temititsanani 'ukarawetsixi 'ena memitama tewawititiweti 'axamemiteyurie? 'Aixia katiyinikeyu tahepaitsita xika pe'uyeha'ani, xika petatsi'ukwini yayupaimeme tima pekawahayewati, nixeime tima miyuta'una peka'ipitiati? [cite: 460, 461, 462]

Yawé, 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya, heitseriemeki yapemitikamie pepihiki. 'Eki pepitatsi'upitia hiki tame 'akuxi temitahayewaniki. 'Axatepite'uyuri, peru hiki 'ahixie tekaniti'uka, tsepaneti mana temiti'u heitserie tepikahexeiya». [cite: 463, 464]
Teiteri 'axamiti'ane kememite'uhayewaxi [cite: 466]
Yunaiti mana memiyukuxeiriekai karima mipai mekaniutiyuani: -Naime kepemitarahiawe yatekateniyurikuni. [cite: 503, 504]

Merikitsi 'Etsitiraxi kepauka yunenewieti 'utatsuati puyutahekiataxi Kakaiyari tukieya hixie titunumaweti, teiteri 'auriena yuwaikawati mekaniyukuxeirieni 'ukitsi, 'ukarawetsixi, türi yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi. Yunaiti miki teiteri mana memiyukuxeiri mekaniutitsuanakaitini waikawameki. [cite: 470, 471]

Hiki xewiti 'Erami nuiwarieyatsie mieme, Tsekaniyaxi titewati Kehieri nu'aya, 'Etsitiraxi hepa 'uyaka mipai katinitahiawe: <<Tame takakaiyari kemaine mipai tepikateyurie, 'ukarawetsixi huma kiekatari tekaniwarutiwitini, peru 'akuxi piyiwe 'aixia temitayurieni hetsia 'ixaheritsixi. [cite: 472]

Hikimi tiratu takakaiyari tekaniwewikuni, mipai tehaitikaiti kename yunaime miki 'ukarawetsixi meta waniwema tewarayeweiyaxiani, 'eki kepemitara'ixatsitiwa, meta yunaiti Kakaiyari niukieya meminaki'erie kememaitika. Yaketiiyini naiti 'iniari niukiyari kemaine. [cite: 475, 476]
Kenanukikexi, 'iki hepaitsita matsi 'eki yapetiniyurimiki, tame tepimatsiparewieka. Hikimi yaketineuyuri, kenetirikaiyeni». [cite: 477]

Hiki 'Etsitiraxi 'iki tiu'enieka kananukukeni, yakatiniuyurieni mawari wewiwamete wa'ukiyarima, meta rewitsixi, metatsiere 'ixaheritsixi yunaiti mekaniyihiritiani kename 'aku mete'aye'atiani, kememutiyua hepaitsita, hiki miki yamekateniutanaki'erieni. [cite: 478]

'Anaketa 'Etsitiraxi Kakaiyari tukita kanewayeyani, kaneyani Kuhanahani kiita 'Eriyatsiwi nu'aya hetsia. Mana paa kakwati haa kahareti kaniyuhayewa, waikawameki munutuixiekaiki memu'axiakai hutarieka 'axamemite'uyuriekaiki. [cite: 479, 483]
Hiki 'arike Kura kiekatari meteniukaxatiarieni meta Kerutsareme memitama kename meke'uyukuxeirienike Kerutsareme yunaiti kemi'ane mehehapaniekai hutariekata memu'axiakai. [cite: 484]

Meta mipai mekateniwarayemari'itiani kename kemi'ane haika tukari heutineyu 'ana mikanuani, te'aitamete memanuyetei mipai mepaitikatei, miki yupiinite pitinawaiyarieni meta 'ixaheritsixi wahetsia payeweiyarieni. [cite: 485]

'Ayumieme haika tukari heutineku, xeitewiyari tukariyaritsie 'atanauka metseritsie, Kerutsareme yunaiti teiteri mekaniyukuxeirieni, Kura meta Wenikamini kiekatari. Teiteri yunaiti Kakaiyari tukieya hixie mekanitiyaxe, me'iyiyiakatikaiti miya mitikuxaxatsiwakaiki meta muwiyekaiki wahetsie waikawa. [cite: 486, 487]

Hiki mawari wewiwame 'Etsitiraxi 'utakeka mipai katiniwarutahiawe: -Xeme 'axaxepite'uyuri, mipai xeteyurieti xepitimiiriyaxi 'axamiti'ane 'Ixaheri hetsie mirahiiwaniki, xekaniwarutiwitini hipame 'ukarawetsixi hipame kakaiyarixi memiwarayexeiya. [cite: 489, 492, 493, 494, 495, 496, 497]

Hiki, 'ayumieme, xekeneyutahekiata ke'axaxemite'uyuri Yawé ta'ukiyarima wakakaiyari hetsia, hiki 'ana tita mitinake pita yaxeketeneyurieka. Teiteri Kakaiyari memika'ayexeiya xekeniwaruku'eiri meta miki 'ukarawetsixi memikatateiterima. [cite: 498, 499]
Yunaiti mana memiyuxeiriekai karima mipai mekaniutiyuani: -Naime kepemitarahiawe yatekateniyurikuni. [cite: 503, 504]
Peritsi xeikia tepikayiwawe 'ena kwiepa temititeni, witarita tekaniyiaka, 'iki matsi aniviaka xeitukari ya huta tukari pikamieme, tekanimiireni 'iki 'axami'ane temeitiwiwiexia. [cite: 505]

Mipai tepaitika tame 'aixia katiyini te'aitamete memanuyetei xeikia memiyuhayewa, yunaiti kemi'ane takiekaritsie memititetika 'ukarawetsixi hipame memiwarutiwiti miki tukari ke'utipiyani kepauka memayenexiani, meta xeikia 'itsikate miki kiekaritsie miemete wa- hamatia me'aye'uti, kepaukake takakaiyari mikahaxiapieni 'axatemite'uyuriki. [cite: 506, 507]
Kunatani 'Atsaheri nu'aya meta Kahatsiyaxi Tikiwa nu'aya, miki yamepikateha'eriwakai, rewitsixi mewaparewiekaku Metsurani meta Tsawetahi. [cite: 508]

Memu'axiakai memehapaniekai meripaiti yameteniuyurieni kehepai memite'uxatakai. Hiki mawari wewiwame 'Etsitiraxi kaniwaranayexeiya hipame meta kememitetetewakai kaniwarutiteriwa hipame 'ukirawetsixi, muyukatsutiatsie mexiakame tukaritsie tamamata metseritsie mana kaniwarukuxeirieni para 'aixia mitiyurieniki miki hepaitsita. [cite: 509]

Mexiakame tukaritsie mexiakame metseritsie mekateniutahayewa 'aixia meteyurieti miki yunaime wahetsiemieme 'ukarawetsixi hipame memiwarutiwitixia wahepaitsita. Kemi'ane wahetsie mirahiiwakai [cite: 510, 511]
Mawari wewiwamete wanuiwarima hipame 'ukarawetsixi memiwarutiwitikai 'iki mekanihikitini: Ketsuha Kutsaraki nu'aya, meta wa'iwama: Matsehiyaxi, 'Eriyetsexi, Kariwi meta Kerariyaxi, [cite: 518, 519]
miki yameniutiyuani yu'iitama memiwaku'eiriexianiki, meta xeime muxa 'ukitime mekaniutimawa 'axamemite'uyuriki 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki. [cite: 520]
'Imexi nuiwarimama: Kananihi meta Tsewariyaxi. [cite: 521]
Karini nuiwarimama: Matsehiyaxi, 'Eriyaxi, Tsemahiyaxi, Kehieri meta 'Utsiyaxi. [cite: 522]
Patsuxi nuiwarimama: 'Erihuhenahi, Matsehiyaxi, 'Itsimaheri, Natanaheri, Kutsawari meta 'Eratsa. [cite: 523]
Rewitsixi kemi'ane memiyiakai: Kutsawari, Tsimi, Kerahiyaxi Kerita titi mititewakai, Petahiyaxi, Kura, meta 'Eriyetsexi. [cite: 524, 525, 526, 527]
Kwikamete kemi'ane memiyiakai: 'Eriyatsiwi. Kitenie tehiwemete kemi'ane memiyiakai: Tsaruni, Tereni meta 'Urihi. [cite: 528, 529]
Hipatita meta 'ixaheritsixi kemi'ane memiyiakai: Parutsi nuiwarimama: Xamiyaxi, Ketsiyaxi, Marikiyaxi, Mikamini, 'Eriyatsaxi, Marikiyaxi meta Wenahiyaxi. [cite: 530, 531, 534]
'Erami nuiwarimama: Mataniyaxi, Tsakariyaxi, Kehieri, 'Awiri, Keremuti meta 'Eriyaxi. [cite: 535, 537]
Tsatuhu nuiwarimama: 'Erihuhenahi, 'Eriyatsiwi, Mataniyaxi, Keremuti, Tsawari meta 'Atsitsa. [cite: 538]
Wewahi nuiwarimama: Kuhanahani, Kananiyaxi, Tsawahi meta 'Atirahi. [cite: 539]
Wanihi nuiwarimama: Metsurani, Maruki, 'Arahiyaxi, Yatsuwi, Tsehari meta Xamuti. [cite: 540]
Pakati-Muhawi nuiwarimama: 'Arina, Kerari, Wenahiyaxi, Matsehiyaxi, Mataniyaxi, Wetsareri, Winuhi meta Manatsexi. [cite: 541]
Karini nuiwarimama: 'Eriyetsexi, 'Itsiyaxi, Marikiyaxi, Tsemahiyaxi, Tsimehuni, [cite: 542]
Wenikamini, Maruki meta Tsemariyaxi. [cite: 543]
Katsuni nuiwarimama: Matenahi, Matata, Tsawari, 'Eripereti, Keremahi, Manatsexi meta Tsimi. [cite: 544]
Wanihi nuiwarimama: Marahi, 'Amirani, 'Uheri, [cite: 545]
Wenahiyaxi, Weriyaxi, Keruhi, [cite: 546]
Waniyaxi, Meremuti, 'Eriyatsiwi, [cite: 547]
Mataniyaxi, Matenahi, Katsahi. [cite: 548]
Winuhi nuiwarimama: Tsimi, [cite: 549]
Tseremiyaxi, Natani, 'Arahiyaxi, [cite: 550]
Manarewahi, Tsatsahi, Tsarahi, [cite: 551]
'Atsareri, Tseremiyaxi, Tsemariyaxi, [cite: 552]
Tsaruni, 'Amariyaxi meta Kutse. [cite: 553]
Newu nuiwarimama: Keyeri, Matatiyaxi, Tsawari, Tsewina, Karahu, Kuheri meta Wenahiyaxi. [cite: 554]
'Iki yunaiti hipame 'ukarawetsixi memikawateiterimatikai witikaitini, hipati 'ari tiri mekaniwarayex- eiyaxiakaitini wahetsie. [cite: 559, 560, 562, 563, 564]
